name: Influencer Marketing – LinkX.fan
author: sahumedia

sections.description:
Influencer Marketing – LinkX.fan
★★★★★

Track Influencer with LinkX.fan – Evaluate influencers and see sales. Do you work with influencers and can never really understand what they have achieved? Is the administrative burden relatively high? We bring you the solution with linkX.fan your portal for influencer marketing 2021!

Best Features

  • Easy Setup
    Install add u’re AppID and Done!

  • 100% Free!

  • Influencer Click-Tracking

  • Influencer Sales

  • Influencer Conversion Rate

  • Influencer Management Dashboard

linkX.fan is aimed primarily at entrepreneurs who want to do influencer marketing. The advantage and strength of linkX.fan lies in the management of influencer campaigns and the measurement of key figures.

With linkX.fan you manage your influencers, create campaigns and briefings for your influencers. In addition, the influencer of your choice can be tracked so that you can track any sales, whether through a link or a voucher.

Traffic is also tracked. Another important feature is that you can offer various attractive billing systems with your influencers.

3rd Party Service

Please note that an account with the provider linkX.fan must be available to use the plugin, this is free.
sections.faq:
Is there any documentation?

Current we dont have a english documentation, but a german one.

Do I need WooCommerce?

No, but we would recommend it.

Does the plugin cost money?

Not at the moment, but we reserve the right to do so.
